content:
Hi. As requested, today I will commit changes to Device and the new DeviceDefinition resource. Sadly I missed quite some discussions and perhaps I miss some content, so I will look for feedback.
IMO this is a step forward from what we had.
can you fix this as well? #Broken Search Expressions for the device extension
@Eric Haas you need to tell me what this issue is.
the search parameter FHIRpath expression is incorrect.
